t: The Amazon War and the Evolution of Private Law - Marginal REVOLUTION
s: December 31, 2018 - It’s well known that to boost their sales, sellers sometimes post fake 5-star reviews on Amazon. Amazon tries to police such actions by searching out and banning sites with fake reviews. An unintended consequence is that some sellers now post fake 5-star reviews on their competitor’s site.
